abstract.para: This chapter gives you some background informations about Finance::Quote.

sect1.title: Finance::Quote Sources
sect1.para: There are 3 types of sources of which the first - currency - is hardcoded and responsible to fetch ISO currencies. The other two can be selected in the security editor.

entry.para: In 2012 happened a modification on the website. Make shure, you updated F::Q to version 1.18.
Association of Mutual Funds In India, IN
Bucharest Stock Exchange (Bursa de Valori Bucuresti), RO
Also here were changes, which require at least F::Q 1.18.
US Govt. Thrift Savings Plan, US

sect2.title: Finance::Quote Sources - Multiple sources
sect2.para: Sources: src/engine/gnc-commodity.c:gnc_quote_source (commit 05da881, which was adjusted for Finance::Quote 1.38), &app;-Wiki, bugzilla, mailing list archive.

abstract.para: Yahoo offers quotes from many exchanges and markets. If you are not asking for US markets, you has to specify where to look. A typical Yahoo symbol has the form <ISIN><markets suffix>.

table.title: Yahoo Codes for Exchanges and Markets

abstract.para:
TIAA-CREF Annuities are not listed on any exchange, unlike their mutual funds TIAA-CREF provides unit values via a cgi on their website. The cgi returns a csv file in the format
bogus_symbol1,price1,date1 bogus_symbol2,price2,date2 ..etc.
where bogus_symbol takes on the following values for the various annuities:

note.para: The symbols are case-sensitive and changed their capitalization in the last time.

table.title: Pseudo-symbols that can be used for TIAA-CREF quotes

entry.para: TIAA-CREF Emerging Markets Equity Index Fund (Retirement)
TIAA-CREF Lifecycle Index Retirement Income Fund (Retirement)
TIAA-CREF Emerging Markets Equity Index Fund (Institutional)

TIAA-CREF Enhanced Large-Cap Growth Index Fund (Institutional)
TIAA-CREF Enhanced Large-Cap Value Index Fund (Institutional)
TIAA-CREF Lifecycle Index Retirement Income Fund (Institutional)
TIAA-CREF Emerging Markets Equity Index Fund (Retail)
TIAA-CREF Emerging Markets Equity Index Fund (Premier)
TIAA-CREF Lifecycle Index Retirement Income Fund (Premier)
